ai-patthana18.26:0.2_0: (This should be expanded as in the teachings,)
ai-patthana18.26:1.1_0: No matter what the Teaching are not the essence, the meaning, the teaching, and the reason for the brief.
ai-patthana18.26:2.1_0: name on the support of one, the support of the earth.
ai-patthana18.26:4.1_0: name on the support of one, the support of the earth.
ai-patthana18.26:5.1_0: Without making a reason for staying on the teaching, it’s not the support of the teaching.
ai-patthana18.26:5.1_1: With a refuge and on, not the teaching, there is no cause or condition for the teachings.
ai-patthana18.26:6.1_0: In the past, future, or present, the scope of letting go of two different things.
